title: Merc's updated GLC, new BMW M8 Gran Coupe - Top new models of the week
text:
Wheels24 Lance Branquinho got behind the wheel of the latest edition of the Mercedes-Benz GLC, read what he had to say about the luxury SUV.

As part of the EV mobility tour, Nissan South Africa had a couple of ‘leaves’ for motoring media to take for a brief drive.

More models

Continuing from the GLC, Mercedes-Benz have also launched the new A-Class sedan and CLA coupe.

DRIVEN | Mercedes-Benz launches its new A-Class sedan and emotional CLA

Interested in buying the Volkswagen T-Cross? Wheels24's Janine Van der Post points out 10 things you should know about the new 'baby SUV'.

BMW has released details of its M8 Gran Coupe Competition, that will be making its way to South Africa next year.

Click on the links below to read the full article:
description: Here are the top new models launched this week both locally and internationally.
